refnamediv.refpurpose: This function estimates cross power spectrum of data x and y by the Welch (1967) periodogram/FFT method.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: [PXX, FREQ] = cpsd(X, Y) [...] = cpsd(X, Y, WINDOW) [...] = cpsd(X, Y, WINDOW, OVERLAP) [...] = cpsd(X, Y, WINDOW, OVERLAP, NFFT) [...] = cpsd(X, Y, WINDOW, OVERLAP, NFFT, FS) [...] = cpsd(X, Y, WINDOW, OVERLAP, NFFT, FS, RANGE) cpsd(...)

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Estimate cross power spectrum of data X and Y by the Welch (1967) periodogram/FFT method.
